definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: Only in this way ca fantastic I finish the work intime.
sentences.chinese: 唯有這樣我智力及時完成職責。

sentences.english: Most ancient Chinese people thought that nothing is lofty except reading books.
sentences.chinese: 大多數古人認爲萬般皆下品唯有讀書高。

sentences.english: Only they are mute incapable of speech.
sentences.chinese: 唯有他們是不能作聲，不能說話的。

sentences.english: And that is how illusion and delusion vanishes .
sentences.chinese: 唯有放下，所有幻覺與假相才得以消失。

sentences.english: With regards to his legal battle with Datuk Seri Tiong, I can only wish him good luck.
sentences.chinese: 至於和張慶信的交戰，我唯有祝他好運。

sentences.english: This and only this will establish the basis for a transition to anything.
sentences.chinese: 唯有如此，才能爲建立任何的過渡方案打下基礎。

sentences.english: Or I only and Barnabas, have not we power to do this?
sentences.chinese: 或者，唯有我和巴爾納伯沒有不勞作的權利嗎？

sentences.english: House: Only an idiot gets between Ahab and his whale.
sentences.chinese: 唯有傻子纔會橫在亞哈和白鯨之間。

sentences.english: Follow of Kelaili only the mandolin musical instrument with a lonely divert oneself from loneliness or boredom.
sentences.chinese: 跟隨柯萊利的唯有一把排遣孤寂的曼陀林琴。

sentences.english: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
sentences.chinese: 唯有一種人是異常的，即無法去愛的人。

sentences.english: Only an act of true love can thaw a frozen heart.
sentences.chinese: 唯有真愛才能夠融化冰凍的心。

sentences.english: Only those who understand tragedy really appreciate comedy.
sentences.chinese: 唯有懂得悲劇的人，始真能欣賞喜劇。

sentences.english: Only the wearer knows where the shoe pinches.
sentences.chinese: 鞋子夾不夾腳，唯有穿者知曉。

sentences.english: Wake up from standby possible only vian electricing key.
sentences.chinese: 待機下唯有掛機鍵可喚醒設備。
嗚咽，唯有你單獨向隅而泣。

sentences.english: Six contestants, three stunts, one winner.
sentences.chinese: 六名選手，三項特技，唯有一名勝者。

definition: (emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique
